name: Magic Alchemist Shuffle
description:
Magic Alchemist Shuffle

It was a beautiful clear night ...
when suddenly the stars vanished.

The Magic Alchemist and his little cat Precious face their biggest challenge. Will you help them to recreate all the constellations? For this purpose you need some magic and a smart mind.

---

A magical game for thinkers and stargazers

Magic Alchemist Shuffle begins with a starless sky and all 88 constellations have to be restored. To reach this twinkling goal the essence of many magical Imago will be required.

* Merge identical pieces by moving them to attain their essence.

* Fill the magic vessels with the essence of Imago.

* Use various extras such as exploding fireballs, unfathomable water or colorful butterflies.

* Thieving fairies, magical locks, rotating vortexes and sparkling diamonds will challenge your strategy.

* Over 1600 levels with more than 800 stars and all known 88 constellations (+ 2 additional mysterious constellations).

* The first 32 constellations which means more than 600 levels, are completely for free to play and grand weeks of fun.

* Enjoy the view of your nightly sky! For all your restored constellations, you can show their latin or english names as well as the constellation lines.

* Get to know a little cat with extraordinary poetic talent that may have some bad habits, too.

* If you like, share your highscores with other players in your country and around the world.
